actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service under the civil service certain additional service performed on a temporary or indefinite basis by employees in regular positions covered by such system, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes as creditable service under the civil service retirement system additional service performed on a termporary or indefinite basis by employees in regular positions covered by such system. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service under the civil service certain additional service performed on a temporary or indefinite basis by employees in regular positions covered by such system, and for other purposes.
